name: LegendOfTheCave
description:
The Legend of the cave is a puzzle platformer where you try and escape a cave and you find a shotgun that you can use to propel yourself in the opposite direction of the gun s hot. There Aare many puzzles in the cave and many mutant merchants that you can buy ammo  and med kits from.  However, be careful of the insect bandits as they can ruin your day, can you make it to the daylight? or will you perish in this cave?

The game was made under 1 week due to time restrictions and we hope that you check out our game, If you do, great! head on to the download page.
